name: opencode-conductor-bridge

scripts.maintenance: git merge --abort || true && git reset --hard origin/main && git clean -fd && git submodule update --init --recursive && npm run sync && npx tsx scripts/setup-bridge.ts .
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run sync && npm run verify:compat && npm run verify:docs && npm run test:coverage

author: Danilo Bardusco <danilo@bardusco.com>
description: Bridge Gemini Conductor's Context-Driven Development protocol to OpenCode.
